scripts.build: rm -rf .parcel-cache/ dist/ && parcel build --no-source-maps src/index.html && cp src/static/* dist/ && cp src/img/card_* dist/img/
scripts.deploy-dev: yarn build && wrangler pages publish dist/ --project-name mountsogol --branch dev
scripts.deploy-prod: yarn build && wrangler pages publish dist/ --project-name mountsogol --branch main
